channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A new look at the classiffication of the tri-covectors of a 6-dimensional symplectic space
item.description: arXiv:2412.03135v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Let $\mathbb{F}$ be a field of characteristic $\neq 2$ and $3$, let $V$ be a $\mathbb{F}$-vector space of dimension $6$, and let $\Omega \in \wedge ^2V^\ast $ be a non-degenerate form. A system of generators for polynomial invariant functions under the tensorial action of the group $Sp(\Omega )$ on $\wedge ^3 V^\ast $, is given explicitly. Applications of these results to the normal forms of De Bruyn-Kwiatkowski and Popov are given.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: Linear and Multilinear Algebra vol 67, issue 5 (2019), pages 939-952
item.dc:creator: Jaime Mu\~noz Masqu\'e, Luis Miguel Pozo Coronado
